Text: Eddie Rips Up the World Tour was a concert tour by Iron Maiden in 2005 based on bringing back rarities from the first four Iron Maiden albums for the younger audience ("Iron Maiden", "Killers", "The Number of the Beast" and "Piece of Mind"), brought about by the band's 2004 DVD "".
